dmca.title: Copyright
dmca.body:
Link to original Document here

5 Oct 2007 18:53:20 GMT
google

Re: Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros. Property

Dear google:

I am writing this letter on behalf of Warner Bros.
Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros."), in response to the discovery of
copyrighted works from Warner Bros.' located at google. Specifically,
we note the unauthorized use therein of images and content from the
following Warner Bros. motion pictures and/or television programs:

Title: 300
Infringement Source: Web
Initial Infringement Timestamp: 5 Oct 2007 18:51:03 GMT
Recent Infringment Timestamp: 5 Oct 2007 18:51:03 GMT
Infringer Username:
Infringing Filename:
http://allmoviesreview.blogspot.com/2007/10/watch-300-full-length-movie-online-for.html
Infringing Filesize: 1
Infringers IP Address: 72.14.207.191
Infringers DNS Name:
Infringing URL:
http://allmoviesreview.blogspot.com/2007/10/watch-300-full-length-movie-online-for.html

This material is infringing and should be removed or access to it disabled.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. The
information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, I declare that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. It is Warner
Bros.' position that google is not entitled to safe harbor under the
provisions of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. Nonetheless, this
notice is styled - for your ease - as one you'd consider a 'take down
notice.'

Material published by Warner Bros. is copyrighted and Warner Bros. has
valuable rights in and to such material, which rights are protected by
law. Complete episodes and excerpts of such material and any other
property of Warner Bros. may not be used without permission of Warner
Bros. The unauthorized use thereof by you and/or your website
seriously compromises the interests of Warner Bros. in violation of
Warner Bros.' federally protected rights. Warner Bros. must therefore
act to protect our rights and prevent such unauthorized uses.

We hereby demand that you disable access to all such unauthorized
Warner Bros. materials and cease distribution immediately, via all
means, of all proprietary Warner Bros. materials. We further demand
that you agree to refrain from enabling further unauthorized use of
properties owned by Warner Bros. in any manner whatsoever.

Furthermore, should you wish to discuss obtaining permission for the
use of material of a Warner Bros. property, you should contact Warner
Bros. for permission. Any such discussions regarding legitimate uses
of Warner Bros. approved content are predicated upon immediate removal
of unauthorized Warner Bros. material.

Please be assured that Warner Bros. considers this a serious matter.
Accordingly, we require that you comply with the foregoing demands by
removing the infringing material identified herein forthwith. Your
failure to respond to this matter as requested and/or any further
unauthorized use of Warner Bros.' copyrighted materials may compel
Warner Bros. to pursue more formal channels to protect its rights and
the integrity of its services.

Please note that nothing contained in this letter nor any act or
omission to act by Warner Bros., its parents, subsidiaries and
affiliates is intended or should be deemed to be a waiver or
modification of any rights or remedies which Warner Bros., its
parents, subsidiaries and affiliates may have, and all such rights or
remedies, whether at law or at equity, are hereby expressly reserved.

I look forward to your prompt response to this matter.

Sincerely,

[private]
Vice President, Anti-Piracy Internet Operations
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
[private]
Burbank, CA [private]
[private] - phone
[private] - fax
